WorkItem.Description:
In my code:

```
import Greeter = module("greeter");

(new Greeter()).greet("typescript");
```

I get the error

```
/media/sf_Ty/workspace/Personal/Web/ships/src/main.ts(1,24): error TS1005: ';' expected.
```

It is expecting a semicolon right after the last character in 'module'

Version 0.9.1.0
WorkItem.Summary: TS10005, expecting ';' in the middle of module import

Comments.Message: I think it is related to https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/1435 .
